Friendship.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
Friendship.author: Marcel Proust

Friendship.quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
Friendship.author: Thomas Aquinas

Friendship.quote: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
Friendship.author: Epicurus

Life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Life.author: Confucius

Life.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
Life.author: Buddha

Life.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
Life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Life.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
Life.author: Audrey Hepburn

Love.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
Love.author: Lao Tzu

Love.quote: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
Love.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

Love.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
Love.author: Loretta Young

Love.quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.
Love.author: James Baldwin

Motivation.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Motivation.author: Confucius

Motivation.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Motivation.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Motivation.author: Aristotle

Motivation.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
Motivation.author: George S. Patton

Success.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out.
Success.author: Robert Collier

Success.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Success.author: Albert Schweitzer

Success.quote: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.
Success.author: John F. Kennedy

Success.quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
Success.author: Confucius
